statements: SELECT * FROM crops WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, type FROM crops WHERE planting_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, type, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crops;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE type = 'fruit';
SELECT name FROM crops WHERE planting_date > '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE harvest_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE type = 'vegetable' AND planting_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, name, type FROM crops WHERE harvest_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT type FROM crops;
SELECT * FROM crops ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM crops ORDER BY harvest_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM crops;
SELECT AVG(id) FROM crops;
SELECT MAX(planting_date) FROM crops;
SELECT MIN(harvest_date) FROM crops;
SELECT name, COUNT(*) FROM crops GROUP BY name;
SELECT type, COUNT(*) FROM crops GROUP BY type;
SELECT type, AVG(id) FROM crops GROUP BY type;
SELECT name, MAX(planting_date) FROM crops GROUP BY name;
SELECT type, MIN(harvest_date) FROM crops GROUP BY type;
SELECT * FROM field
SELECT field_id, field_name FROM field
SELECT field_name, crop_type FROM field
SELECT * FROM field WHERE field_size > 100
SELECT field_id, field_name FROM field WHERE crop_type = 'Corn'
SELECT AVG(field_size) FROM field
SELECT MAX(field_size) FROM field
SELECT MIN(field_size) FROM field
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM field
SELECT DISTINCT crop_type FROM field
SELECT * FROM field ORDER BY field_size DESC
SELECT * FROM field WHERE crop_type = 'Wheat' ORDER BY field_id ASC
SELECT field_id, field_name, field_size FROM field WHERE crop_type = 'Barley' ORDER BY field_size DESC
SELECT field_id, SUM(field_size) AS total_size FROM field GROUP BY field_id
SELECT field_name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM field GROUP BY field_name
SELECT field_size, AVG(field_size) AS avg_size FROM field GROUP BY field_size HAVING AVG(field_size) > 50
SELECT field_id, field_name FROM field WHERE crop_type LIKE '%e%'
SELECT field_id, field_name FROM field WHERE field_size BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT field_name, crop_type FROM field WHERE field_size > 200
SELECT * FROM field WHERE field_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9)
SELECT * FROM crop
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crop
SELECT crop_id, crop_name, crop_type FROM crop WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit'
SELECT * FROM crop WHERE crop_id = 1
SELECT crop_name FROM crop WHERE crop_id = 2
SELECT DISTINCT crop_type FROM crop
SELECT * FROM crop ORDER BY crop_name ASC
SELECT * FROM crop LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM crop WHERE crop_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT crop_name, UPPER(crop_type) FROM crop
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM crop
SELECT AVG(crop_id) FROM crop
SELECT MIN(crop_id) FROM crop
SELECT MAX(crop_id) FROM crop
SELECT SUM(crop_id) FROM crop
SELECT * FROM crop WHERE crop_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT * FROM crop WHERE crop_type = 'Vegetable' OR crop_type = 'Grain'
SELECT * FROM crop WHERE crop_name IN ('Apple', 'Orange', 'Banana')
SELECT * FROM crop WHERE crop_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM crop WHERE crop_name LIKE '%Corn%'
SELECT * FROM Crop
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM Crop
SELECT * FROM Field
SELECT field_name, area FROM Field
SELECT * FROM WeatherSensor
SELECT location, sensor_type FROM WeatherSensor
SELECT * FROM IrrigationSystem
SELECT system_type, capacity FROM IrrigationSystem
SELECT * FROM CropHealth
SELECT health_status, timestamp FROM CropHealth
SELECT c.crop_name, f.field_name FROM Crop c JOIN Field f ON c.crop_id = f.crop_id
SELECT w.location, i.system_type FROM WeatherSensor w JOIN IrrigationSystem i ON w.field_id = i.field_id
SELECT c.crop_name, h.health_status FROM Crop c JOIN CropHealth h ON c.crop_id = h.field_id
SELECT c.crop_type, f.area FROM Crop c JOIN Field f ON c.crop_id = f.crop_id
SELECT c.crop_name, f.area, h.health_status FROM Crop c JOIN Field f ON c.crop_id = f.crop_id JOIN CropHealth h ON f.field_id = h.field_id
SELECT w.location, i.system_type, h.timestamp FROM WeatherSensor w JOIN IrrigationSystem i ON w.field_id = i.field_id JOIN CropHealth h ON i.field_id = h.field_id
SELECT c.crop_name, f.area, h.health_status, w.location FROM Crop c JOIN Field f ON c.crop_id = f.crop_id JOIN CropHealth h ON f.field_id = h.field_id JOIN WeatherSensor w ON f.field_id = w.field_id

SELECT c.crop_name, f.area, h.health_status, w.location, i.system_type FROM Crop c JOIN Field f ON c.crop_id = f.crop_id JOIN CropHealth h ON f.field_id = h.field_id JOIN WeatherSensor w ON f.field_id = w.field_id JOIN IrrigationSystem i ON f.field_id = i.field_id

SELECT c.crop_name, f.area, h.health_status, w.location, i.system_type, h.timestamp FROM Crop c JOIN Field f ON c.crop_id = f.crop_id JOIN CropHealth h ON f.field_id = h.field_id JOIN WeatherSensor w ON f.field_id = w.field_id JOIN IrrigationSystem i ON f.field_id = i.field_id JOIN CropHealth h ON f.field_id = h.field_id
